userapips4.c File Reference

Implements the ps4 specific code to request UserProfiles, and parse the responses. More...

Detailed Description

Implements the ps4 specific code to request UserProfiles, and parse the responses.

Note
None.
Attention
Copyright (c) Tiburon Entertainment / Electronic Arts 2001-2013. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
Version
04/11/13 (akirchner) First Version

int32_t UserApiPlatControl ( UserApiRefT *  pRef,
int32_t  iControl,
int32_t  iValue,
int32_t  iValue2,
void *  pValue 
)

Control behavior of module.

Parameters
*pRef- pointer to module state
iControl- status selector
iValue- control value
iValue2- control value
*pValue- control value
Returns
int32_t - Return 0 if successful. Otherwise a selector specific error
Note
iControl can be one of the following:
        'avsz' - Set which avatar size will be retrieved. iValue = 's' for small, 'm' for medium and 'l' for big. 's' is the default value, and this is just functional for PS4.
Version
05/10/2013 (mcorcoran) - First version
